In this paper, we will present three JavaScript modules related to the Faust language: an updated version of the Faust WebAssembly compiler faustwasm,2 and two DSP generation tools based on this compiler faust2wam3 and @jspatcher/package-dsp. 4 faustwasm is an updated version of the previous JavaScript interface of the Faust WebAssembly compiler faust2webaudio.

Despite the complexity of the workflow and the implementation of the JavaScript-side interface, the possibilities of bringing DSP modules from C/C++ code to the Web becomes a hot research topic, as these DSPs initially written for native platforms can be ported to the web using cross-compiler systems like Emscripten [11].
